title: Studio Ghibli
description:
Studio Ghibli "Hayao Miyazaki & Joe Hisaishi" Soundtrack Box 2014 OGG

  <a href="
https://i.imgur.com/h5qQMWS.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://i.imgur.com/h5qQMWS.jpg</a>
__

Original soundtrack collection from Studio Ghibli includes 12 soundtrack CDs for animation films directed by Hayao Miyazaki all composed by Joe Hisaishi. These CDs have been remastered in the HQCD format for the best sound and are fully compatible with standard CD players. Their covers are cardboard sleeves faithfully replicating the original LP cover artworks. Comes with a bonus CD and a catalog booklet.

08. Laputa: Castle in the Sky (USA Soundtrack)

09. Howl's Moving Castle (Original Soundtrack)

10. Ponyo on the Cliff by the Sea (Original Soundtrack)

11. The Wind Rises (Original Soundtrack)

12. Mr. Dough and the Egg Princess (Original Soundtrack)

13. Bonus CD Kiki's Delivery Service (Mini Drama CD).
